hints.content: Let's count how many volcanoes had a height of $50\text{ cm}$.

One volcano, blast em, measured $\greenE{50}\text{ cm}$  

So, we place $1$ dot over $\greenE{50}$ on the number line.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fab7b8c0713f2fb16875a4cca42f9975117c5c0d)
Now, let's graph the other measurements on the table.

Here is the completed line plot:

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/79bec444cf5a2bdb322e96660866bfc72386d876)

question.content:
Science class has built volcanoes.  The students are going to make a line plot of the volcano heights.  

Volcano | Height ($\text{cm}$)
:-: | :-: | :-:
Blast Em | $50$
King Lava | $52$
Erupto | $51$
Volcan | $53$
Boom | $52$

**Graph the measurements from the table on the line plot.**   
*Click above the line plot to make dots for each of the measurements.*

[[â˜ƒ plotter 1]]
